metadata.title: CVE-2017-18922 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: It was discovered that websockets.c in LibVNCServer prior to 0.9.12 did notproperly decode certain WebSocket frames. A malicious attacker couldexploit this by sending specially crafted WebSocket frames to a server,causing a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: libvncserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
x11vnc package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
